thread.section_title: Enterprise Training School, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enterprise Training School, Inc. | etrainingschool.com
thread.title: William
thread.title_full: Enterprise Training School, Inc. reviewed by William

author: William
title: William
text: I knocked out my 24 required credits in early January with Tom. Tom is intelligent, knowledgeable, engaging, professional, polite and at times fun and entertaining. This was my first web-based virtual CE training and I thought it was much better than the classroom setting. An administrator with Enterprise responded very quickly to a question that I sent on the first day of training. I was impressed by and would recommend Enterprise.
